text: For Love and Honor () is a 2007 Turkish drama movie directed by Ömer Vargı and starring Şener Şen, Rasim Öztekin, Kenan İmirzalıoğlu, İsmail Hacıoğlu, Ruhi Sarı, Aslı Tandoğan. ==Other websites== * Category:2007 drama movies Category:Turkish movies Category:Turkish-language movies Category:Movies directed by Ömer Vargı
title: For Love and Honor
